title: How can I change my Editor skin?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I would like to display Unity in its Pro/dark skin.
  • I have upgraded to Unity Pro but the Editor is still in the light skin.

sections.title: Cause
content: The dark skin option can only be applied in Unity Plus or Pro. If you have Unity Personal activated unfortunately this feature is not available.

sections.title: Resolution
content: If you have upgraded your license from Personal to Plus or Pro, first update your serial in the Editor, then follow this process:
1. Open up the Unity Editor and open one of your projects.
2. Click the "Edit" drop down menu in Windows, or "Unity" for Mac/Linux.
5. Under the "General" tab, select "Professional" next to  "Editor Skin"
